item.title: P4WB (Pray For WAR Babies)
item.description:
Internationally, the age of entry into prostitution is 12 years of age. There is a myth that the younger the child, the less likely they will have STDs or AIDS/HIV.
This video sheds light on the young face of modern day slavery both domestically and internationally. Join us in encircling these children in Protection, Love, and Prayer.

item.title: Women At Risk International Civilian First Responder
The Real Me
item.description: Set to Natalie Grant's "The Real Me," this video gives faces to trafficking victims through footage from our partnering safe houses in Southeast Asia.

item.title: Daughters of Cambodia
item.description: Reaching out to the victims of sex-trafficking in Cambodia. Find out more info at daughtersofcambodia.org

item.title: Warning to all young women in China
item.description: This DVD will be shown in middle and high schools all over China. We have also posted it on many Chinese websites, please pray this video will be a big hit and many young women will be warned about the dangers of traffickers
